label: Walters MS 5
description: These are images of Walters Ms. W.5, Gospels of Abbot Duden, on parchment, 11th century. For full description, see http://www.thedigitalwalters.org/Data/WaltersManuscripts/html/W5/description.html [NOTE: Cataloging in process]
